articles.title: Malaika Arora looks classy in mini sweater dress and ₹84k boots: Don't miss the price of her bag - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Malaika Arora looked classy in a white mini sweater dress and matching boots. She wore the ensemble for visiting her sister Amrita Arora with her son, Arhaan Khan. The boots are worth ₹84k. Can you guess the price of her bag?
